ARABIC: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'I am going towards my Lord; He will be my guide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And he said: "I am going away to my Lord who will show me the way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Abraham said: “I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Abraham) said, "I will go to my Lord who will guide me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And he said, “Indeed I shall go to my Lord Who will guide me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he said: "Verily, I am going to my Lord. He will guide me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he said: Surely I fly to my lord; He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he said: Lo! I am going unto my Lord Who will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "I will go to my Lord: He is sure to guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he said: verily I am going to my Lord who will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Indeed I am going toward my Lord, who will guide me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "I will go to my Lord! He will surely guide me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he said (after his rescue from the fire): "Verily, I am going to my Lord. He will guide me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'I will go to my Lord; He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I am going towards my Lord, and He will guide me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:99] And he said, ‘I shall indeed depart to my Lord, I shall emigrating to Him from the abode of disbelief — He will guide me, to the place to which My Lord has commanded that I end up in, and this was Syria. When he reached the Holy Land, he said:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he said) Abraham said to Lot: (Lo! I am going unto my Lord) I am going to worship my Lord (Who will guide me) who will save me from them.
